action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi there,

We are looking to make some changes to the 'QuickShip' section on the product pages on our website.

We are introducing three new categories for leadtimes: QuickShip Rapid, QuickShip Standard & QuickShip Custom

Design concept attached with approved copy & formatting BELOW.

Could you please show me what the this updated design would look like on the following pages as examples, before we roll out across the remaining product pages on the website. If you could please action these 3 examples and send back today that would be great!



WoodBeQuiet (QuickShip Rapid) https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/acoustic-planks-woodbequiet/

Our QuickShip rapid offering signifies our commitment to stocking products with minimal lead times. If a product is displayed with a QuickShip rapid symbol, this means the product is constantly being produced to replenish stock levels.

QuickShip rapid products can be despatched within 24 hours. Need it faster? Contact us for our express service rates.

Custom options available for all QuickShip rapid collections (MOQ's apply). Talk to us.



Fracture Panels (QuickShip Standard) https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/fracture-acoustic-panels/

Our expert manufacturing team converts acoustic material into creative, design-led solutions using the latest cutting, bevelling and printing software and machinery. Our standard made to order products have an approx. 2-3-week lead time from payment and order confirmation.

Need it faster? Contact us for our express service rates.

Custom options available for all standard made to order collections (MOQ's apply). Talk to us.


Printed Panels (QuickShip Custom) https://acoufelt.com.au/solution/printed-acoustic-wall-panels/

Original design is our specialty, and our team of product designers, fabricators and project managers are ready to help bring your unique vision to life. If a product is labelled custom, this means you can play with size, colour, cutting, bevelling, printing and more. We'll work with you on project drawings, renderings and sampling to ensure the finished product meets your design vision.


Custom products have an approx. 6-8 week lead time from payment and order confirmation.


Need it faster? Contact us for our express service rates.



** ^ please link all Contact us and Talk to us in the above descriptions to our 'contact us' page (https://acoufelt.com.au/contact-us/)


Should look roughly like this -


Thanks heaps!

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
